hooks.command: PYTHON_CMD=$([ -f "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/.venv/bin/python" ] && echo "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/.venv/bin/python" || (command -v python3.11 >/dev/null && echo python3.11) || (command -v python3.10 >/dev/null && echo python3.10) || echo python3); $PYTHON_CMD ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/scripts/exec.py daemon start --background --quiet 2>/dev/null || true
